thread.title: Two-For-One Luxury Travel Deals | Travel + Leisure
thread.title_full: Two-For-One Luxury Travel Deals | Travel + Leisure

author: Lisa Cheng
title: Two-For-One Luxury Travel Deals | Travel + Leisure
text:
Four Incredible 2-For-1 Deals to Book Now By Lisa Cheng February 27, 2017 Getty Images/iStockphoto Want bargains on extraordinary trips? Sign up for the T+L Deals newsletter for weekly discounts on hotels, cruises, flights, and more! T+L Newsletters 
Including a 12-day African safari. India 
Book a two-for-one Himalayan snow leopard adventure from Crooked Compass , an Australia-based tour operator that offers intrepid voyages from puma tracking in Patagonia to photography expeditions in Myanmar. 
The Snow Leopard Tour includes : Fifteen nights in hotels and camps, including select meals and the use of trekking equipment All transfers throughout the trip Guided activities, including naturalist-led expeditions through Hemis National Park—a conservancy with a robust population of snow leopards—and photography workshops run by Andrew Peacock A five percent donation to the Snow Leopard Conservancy with each booking 
Original Price: From $5,555 per person ($370 per night) 
T+L Price: From $2,778 per person ($185 per night); book by March 31 
Booking details: Use deal code T&L Indonesia 
Book a two-for-one deal at Komune Resort Yoga & Surf , a palm-fringed wellness getaway in Bali (thatched roof pavilions, a volcanic beach) on the secluded eastern coast of the island. 
Fitness & Detox package includes : Six nights in a Resort Room (second person stays for free) Three meals daily, accompanied by cold-pressed juices, smoothies, or coconut water Personalized nutrition advice A private training session A customized fitness training program for you to take home A choice of one activity per day, such as rice paddy cycle tours, traditional cooking classes, a volcano hike, or white water rafting Unlimited yoga and group fitness classes, including sunrise beach runs and power spinning Hotel Komune gift pack Complimentary return transfers 
Original Price: From $1,435 per person (or $242 per night) 
T+L Price: From $$1,435 for two people (or $121 per person per night); valid through 2017 Florida 
Book a two-for-one deal on a six-day Key West and Dry Tortuga sailing expedition by Intrepid Travel , an adventure company that’s known for offering under-the-radar tours at affordable prices. 
Sailing Adventure includes: Five nights aboard an eight-person catamaran exploring the Florida Keys, Marquesa Keys, and Dry Tortuga National Park, including select meals. Highlights include excursions to the bird sanctuary at Loggerhead, or Hospital Key and the Civil War-era Fort Jefferson, and snorkeling with sea turtles at Tortuga National Park 
Original Price: From $1,329 per person ($266 per night) 
T+L Price: From $1,329 for two people ($133 per night per person); valid for March and April departures Africa 
Book a two-for-one, 12-day African safari from On the Go Tours , including visits to Victoria Falls and Kruger National Park. 
Falls to Joburg Safari includes : Twelve days of guided tours from Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe to Botswana’s Chobe River, the Nata and Blaun regions, and South Africa’s Blyde River Canyon and Kruger National Park Arrival transfers from Vic National Airport, as well as internal transportation Hotel and camping accommodations, including meals Park entry and game drives A Chobe River trip 
Original Price: From $1,395 per person ($116 per night) 
T+L Price: From $1,395 for two people ($58 per person, per night); book by February 28 for travel in 2017 and 2018
